Conversation Diagram.Name: Conversation Diagram
Conversation Diagram.Desc: This is a standard diagram for Conversation Flow. Make a copy of this prompt to customize it for your own agent.
Conversation Diagram.Content:
INIT --> CRAFT_PROMPT("TEXT"): next / action
CRAFT_PROMPT("TEXT") --> GENERATE: next / action
GENERATE --> FINAL: next / action

Tool Use Diagram.Name: Tool Use Diagram
Tool Use Diagram.Desc: This is a standard prompt for Tool Use Flow. Make a copy of this prompt to customize it for your own agent.
Tool Use Diagram.Content:
INIT --> TOOL_CHOICE: next / action

TOOL_CHOICE --> CRAFT_PROMPT("TEXT"): next / action / condition_use_text
    CRAFT_PROMPT("TEXT") --> GENERATE: next / action

TOOL_CHOICE --> CRAFT_PROMPT("TOOL"): next / action / condition_use_tool
    CRAFT_PROMPT("TOOL") --> TOOL_CALL: next / action
    TOOL_CALL --> GOOGLE: next / action
    GOOGLE --> GENERATE: next / action

GENERATE --> FINAL: next / action
